channel.title: Need help with my 508 Source
channel.description:
Okay well ive Downloaded a 508 source but when I run it, it says...
[code]Excepttion in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/rs2/main Press any key to continue.[/code]
But when I click the edit button it has this inside it...
[code]@echo off title Pie-scape 525 server java -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar com.rs2hd.Main pause[/code]
What I want to know is [b]what goes in there[/b]

item.title: Need help with my 508 Source
item.dc:creator: @bite_the_man bite the man
item.description:
@bite_the_man wrote:

check ur post to the run.bat…it says pie-scape525…i think thats just a mistype though…its not defineing ur main file.

This isnt the same code is it?

@echo off title 525 server java -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar com.rs2hd.Main pause

if not, try it…mine runs with it

Read full topic
